bug.author: nmanovic
bug.summary: VOC export of task can lead to error
bug.description:
How to reproduce:
Create a task with attached configuration of labels
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/cvat/files/4338691/task_labels.txt>task_labels.txt</denchmark-link>
Dump empty annotations as COCO or VOC. It will lead to different errors (e.g. FileNotFoundError, AssertionError)
